tool_description: Retrieves current weather conditions and forecasts to optimize HVAC operations based on external temperature, humidity, and weather patterns.

location.description: Location for weather data (city, state or ZIP code)

forecast_hours.description: Number of hours ahead to forecast (1-168)

include_humidity.description: Include humidity data in the response

include_wind.description: Include wind speed data in the response

error_messages: Invalid location: Location not found or incorrectly formatted.
Invalid forecast range: forecast_hours must be between 1-168 (1 week).
Weather service unavailable: Unable to connect to weather service.
API limit exceeded: Too many weather requests - try again later.
usage: Provide location as city/state or ZIP code. Optionally specify forecast_hours and whether to include humidity and wind data. Returns current conditions and forecast.

weather_conditions.description: Weather condition descriptions for each forecast hour

hvac_recommendation.description: Recommended HVAC adjustment based on weather

data_timestamp.description: When the weather data was retrieved
